title: Great 3 Bed, 2 Bath floor plans at Polo Club Apartments
posting_body: ['Polo Club Apartments', 'Leasing Office:', '100 Ashley Creek Cir', 'Stone Mountain, GA 30083', 'show contact info', 'Take a look at what Polo Club Apartments has to offer!', "There's plenty of shopping, dining, outdoor activities and more near Polo Club.", "You'll love living in the Stone Mountain location!", "With a variety of floor plans to choose from, we're certain there's one that's just right for you.", 'Browse our two and three bedroom floor plans.', 'Rental Information:', '3 Bedroom / 2 Bathroom / 1300 sq ft / $1607/Month', 'Lease Terms:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Apartment Amenities:', '− Breakfast Bar', '− Cable Ready', '− Carpet', '− Dining Room', '− Dishwasher', '− Disposal', '− Extra Storage', '− Range', '− Tub/Shower', '− Vinyl Flooring', '− Air Conditioning and Gas Heating', '− Brushed Nickel Lighting Package', '− Cozy Fireplaces', '− Huge Floorplans up to 1300 sq.', 'ft.', '− Newly Updated Apartments', '− Patio or Balcony', '− Roommate Floor Plans', '− Walk-In Closets', '− Washer & Dryer Connections', 'Additional Information:', '− Business Center', '− Clubhouse', '− Community Events', '− On Marta bus-line', '− Pet Care', '− Picnic Area', '− Playground', '− Tennis Court', '− Cardio & Fitness Center', '− Clothes Care Center', '− Electronic Rent Payment', '− Minutes to Stone Mountain park', '− On-Site Management', '− Package Receiving', '− Resort Style Swimming Pool', '− Shopping, Dining, and Entertainment Nearby', 'Leasing Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'show contact info', 'Pet Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pets per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', '$15 monthly pet fee.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50 lbs.', 'For more information, please call our leasing office.', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Management Company:', 'Ventron Management', 'Equal Housing Opportunity.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'A2B702820CD84E1']
